elements.title: Maria Rickmers (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Maria Rickmers (pictured), one of the largest sailing ships of her day, disappeared on her maiden voyage?

elements.title: St. John Church (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a convent at St. John Church was used by Hassan Jeru-Ahmed's Blackman's Development Center, a Black paramilitary group?

elements.title: consciousness to ChatGPT (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that in one survey, two thirds of US adults attributed some possibility of consciousness to ChatGPT?

elements.title: Defense of Azakh (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that one of the most significant episodes of Assyrian resistance during Sayfo was the Defense of Azakh?

elements.title: Gerrit van der Waals (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Dutch soldier Gerrit van der Waals escaped from a German POW camp, aided Jews and anti-Nazi resistance, then was arrested by the Soviets and died in their custody?

elements.title: Tigger's Honey Hunt (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that VHS copies of The Tigger Movie featured $3.00 rebates for Tigger's Honey Hunt?

elements.title: MLS Cup 2025 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the broadcast of MLS Cup 2025 used iPhones for some footage?

elements.title: John Marzetti (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that it is unclear whether John Marzetti is the namesake of Johnny Marzetti?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

Kowloon

One of the most densely populated cities on Earth, Hong Kong's mainland portion offers a culture less influenced by the British than the neighboring Island, plus accommodation, dining, and nightlife are generally cheaper.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

El Cuyo

El Cuyo beckons to visitors looking for a quiet, natural seaside town to bask in the sun undisturbed by revelers while other visitors seek adrenaline-pumping excitement.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

Dehydration

A condition that may affect travellers in many places and for many reasons. Never pleasant, sometimes fatal.
